name: Cryo Elemental Infusion
description: The character to which this is attached has their next Physical DMG dealt converted to Cryo DMG.
descriptionraw: The character to which this is attached has their next $[K100] dealt converted to $[K151].
descriptionreplaced: The character to which this is attached has their next {SPRITE_PRESET#2100}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Physical DMG</color> dealt converted to {SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo DMG</color>.
